patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Lotus playing her ‘out of bounds’ extraction VO during every esophage warp in The Jordas Verdict.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.changes: Removed Lotus’ “Job well done” VO at the end of the Second Dream missions.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.1
patchlogs.additions: Added Lotus tutorial transmissions to Spy missions, Survival missions, and Void Fissure missions. Fun fact: there is an option in your in-game Audio settings titled ‘Enable Hint Transmissions’ (previously was ‘Enable Tutorial Transmission’). Enabling this will give you those Lotus ‘help’ transmissions that play throughout the mission, and disabling it prevents them from playing.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.changes: Increased the brightness of the Guides of The Lotus Sigil.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix: Lunaro 6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Lotus transmissions warning you of an approaching Prosecutor.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Update 1

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed fire/ice damage related Lotus Transmissions playing on the Orokin Moon tileset.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.10.0

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream

patchlogs.additions: Lotus VO has been added to inform players when a fellow Tenno is downed and in need of Reviving!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5

patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Lotus’ Transmission not playing after Tyl Regor is defeated.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a typo in the Lotus’ dialogue in the opening Tutorial Quest.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Lotus occasionally broadcasting transmissions about the Infested on non-Infested Survival Missions.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.1

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the dialogue between Lotus and Maroo at the final mission of Stolen Dreams being out of order.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.7

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm not marking targets when Heightened Reflexes is equipped in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.changes: Excluded Reactant and Index Point pickups from Simulor, Inaros' Sandstorm, Zephyr Tornado, and Vauban's Vortex. This also fixes the exception lists for the Simulor; it wasn't supposed to be moving  gameplay objects (eg Datamass, Excavation Power Cells, Raptor Cells, etc) but it generally wasn't of a problem because the objects were heavy enough (properly excluding them should run faster too!). As more and more gameplay components rely on pickups, we've addressed this issue as it is commonly discussed by you all.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm death FX not showing up for Clients.

patchlogs.changes: Fixed a script error caused by Ash’s Bladestorm ability.

patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Inaros Elemental Sandstorm Mod not being in alphabetical order in the Syndicate offerings list.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue that would cause player’s map to break when trying to type during Ash’s Bladestorm animation.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue that would occur when using Ash’s Blade Storm when inside Limbo’s Rift.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm looping on a single target if that target became immune to the ability after it Bladestorm had begun as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/427783-ash-bladestorm-and-nullifiers/

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Fixed combo finishers for Bladestorm not showing up correctly for clients.  Visuals should now match for client and host, in addition to the melee combo counter tracking properly.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ash`s Bladestorm becoming caught in an infinite loop in PvP, causing invulnerability and idle clones.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Railgun and Shockwave Moa Eximus flickering in their Codex diorama.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed harsh snapping animation when switching between units (such a Eximus units) in Codex diorama.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed when fighting an Arctic Eximus, the enemy inside the bubble wouldn't take damage from any gun or melee until the bubble outside was popped.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Codex drop sources not distinguishing Eximus units.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Penta and Quanta Ranger Eximus’ merging into one another when viewed in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed having two entries for Grineer Warden and Grineer Warden Eximus in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the problem where low-level Interception missions were flooded with Eximus’.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.9
patchlogs.changes: Fixed broken Eximus variations for Corrupted Butcher, Heavy Gunner and Drakar Heavy Gunner preventing them from ever spawning.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.10.4 Operation Rathuum.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed duplicate Codex entries for the Orokin Spectator Eximus.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.3.1 + 18.3.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Eximus units having unusual damage resistance as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/570556-u18-game-breaking-bug-invulnerable-eximus/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Eximus Stronghold Sorties not properly spawning Eximus enemies.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a Atlas’ Petrify having an unusual effect on the Eximus ice shield as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/539173-atlas-petrify-visual-bug-on-artic-eximus/

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemy Eximus Toxic auras proccing on players when the enemy is under the effect of mind control as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/395695-ability-exception-nyx-mind-control-on-ancient-corrupt-eximus/

name: Easter
description: Unlocks a collection of lovely EASTER colors.

name: Tenno
description: Unlocks additional color options reflecting the default colors used on each standard Warframe.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.4
patchlogs.changes: Kuva Guardians will now play their disarming animation properly, instead of having their Twin Rogga’s magically pop into their hands.We’Re Working On A Script To Give The Respective Shoulder Armor To Those Who Purchased The Tennogen Skin. We Will Update You Here When It Is Running/Complete. Script Has Been Run And Has Completed! Please Relog If You Purchased The Banshee Sonority Skin Pre-Hotfix.:

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the TennoGen icon appearing the wrong color in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Tennogen Liset Skins showing a Credit icon instead of Steam icon.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed seeing numerous of the same TennoGen Syandana displayed as a filepath. Attempting to purchase this would result in an error.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.4
patchlogs.changes: *We Are Aware Of An Issue Where You Appear To Be Able To Gift The Harrow Graxx Tennogen Skin In The Market. Upon Selecting This It Will Fail And Not Charge You The Respective Platinum. We’Re Working On Removing The Unintended Option For Our Next Hotfix/Update.:

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.1.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the material of Valkyr’s Delusion Tennogen Skin incorrectly applying when toggling on the Prime details for Valkyr Prime in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Changed the TennoGen Knaita Mag skin’s default colors to match the Steam Workshop’s main image. Icons for Helmet and Skin have been updated to match as well.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some clipping issues with the TennoCon 2017 Syandana.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the “Gift” option appearing on certain TennoGen skins when they are unable to be gifted.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.6.2
patchlogs.changes: Volt’s armor can now be used on Volt Prime so TennoGen Skins can look as intended.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.11.0+19.11.0.1
patchlogs.changes: There is now a ‘Toggle Prime Details’ toggle for TennoGen skins once applied to a Prime Warframe. This allows you to choose between the Prime Warframe mesh or the Default Warframe mesh!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the TennoGen Infested Skana skin not applying properly to the Prisma Skana.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed TennoGen Covenant Syandana occasionally bending oddly with various Stances.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed numerous TennoGen Syandanas clipping through Warframes.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.4.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed numerous TennoGen items that did not have localized description text.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.1
patchlogs.changes: Improved resolution textures on all the TennoGen Round 7 Helmet and Skins.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a significant amount of missing Codex Mods thanks to the helpful Tenno here https://forums.warframe.com/topic/175141-list-of-codex-bugs/?page=14#comment-7954000

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed inconsistent texture on the Officium TennoGen Syandana.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed clipping issues with numerous TennoGen Syandanas.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.changes: Updated the TennoGen Rota Syandana materials.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 2
patchlogs.changes: Updated numerous Hitsu San TennoGen item textures.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U1.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a texture issue with the TennoGen Excalibur Caduto skin.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.4.4
patchlogs.changes: Darvo will more readily chat with Tenno in a busy Relay.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.changes: Fixed players being unable to change colors of their Sigils after equipping the Community of Tenno Sigil.
patchlogs.additions: Lotus VO has been added to inform players when a fellow Tenno is downed and in need of Reviving!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.12.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash that could occur when purchasing TennoGen items through Steam.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.1.0 - 17.1.4
patchlogs.changes: Tenno Reinforcements:

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.7.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Grineer Toxin Injector appearing under ‘Tenno’ in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Tipedo not having Tenno script on it as intended.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Captain Vor standing still and doing nothing during third phase of fight.  Will now properly shoot at Tenno skoom.

name: Daybreak
description: Rise up with these additional color options for Warframe customization.

name: Bastille
description: Unlocks a collection of symbolic colors, found in datamass detailing the record of an ancient battle.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Vauban’s Bastille and Vortex lingering in tiles after players have left said tile.This resulted in enemies continually being damaged or immobile even after the ability ended.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Vauban’s Bastille FX remaining indefinitely upon Host migration.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an error causing Vauban’s Bastille to continue indefinitely if the ability was active before Vauban revived.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nullifier auras from drones in the Law of Retribution Nightmare Trial not properly breaking lingering Warframe CC abilities such as Bastille.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Bastille not working on neutral enemies such as the Kubrow or Sand Skate.
